languages.text: "Если у тебя когда-нибудь хватит силенок бросить мне вызов, я с радостью схлестнусь с тобой в бою, {name}. Может даже оторву тебе твою болтливую голову! А пока прощай, моя охота окончена".
"If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."
languages.original_text: "Если у тебя когда-нибудь хватит силенок бросить мне вызов, я с радостью схлестнусь с тобой в бою, {name}. Может даже оторву тебе твою болтливую голову! А пока прощай, моя охота окончена".

traits.locale_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I would gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Maybe I'll even tear your chatty head off! Goodbye for now, my hunt is over."
"If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I would gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Maybe I'll even tear your chatty head off! Goodbye for now, my hunt is over."
"If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I would gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Maybe I'll even tear your chatty head off! Goodbye for now, my hunt is over."
"If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I would gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Maybe I'll even tear your chatty head off! Goodbye for now, my hunt is over."
"If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."
"If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."

languages.text: «Si alguna vez se siente lo bastante fuerte como para desafiarme, me encantará medir mi acero con usted, {name}. ¡Hasta podría arrancarle esa bocaza tan grande! De momento, esto es un adiós; mi cacería ha terminado».
languages.original_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguna vez se siente lo bastante fuerte como para desafiarme, me encantaría medir mi acero con usted, {name}. ¡Hasta podría cercenarle esa cabeza tan parlanchina! De momento, esto es un adiós; mi cacería ha terminado».

languages.text: “如果某一天你变得很强，强大到足以挑战我，那我很乐意与你刀剑相向，{name}。说不定我可以你那唠唠叨叨的脑袋扯下来！但现在，再见了，我的狩猎已经结束了。”
languages.original_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."

traits.locale_text: “如果某一天你变得很强，强大到足以挑战我，那我很乐意与你刀剑相向，{name}。说不定我可以你那喋喋不休的脑袋扯下来！但现在，再见了，我的狩猎已经结束了。”

languages.text: « Le jour où vous serez de taille à me défier, je croiserai volontiers le fer avec vous, {name}. Je vous ferai peut-être même passer l'envie de vous moquer en vous tranchant la tête ! Mais pour l'heure, ma chasse est terminée. Au revoir. »
languages.original_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."

traits.locale_text: « Le jour où vous serez suffisamment {mf|fort|forte} pour me défier, je croiserai volontiers le fer avec vous, {name}. Je vous ferai peut-être même passer l'envie de vous moquer en vous tranchant la tête ! Pour l'heure, ma chasse est terminée. Au revoir. »

languages.text: 「俺に挑戦するほど強くなったら、喜んで刃を交えてやろう、{name}。もしかしたら、お前のおしゃべりな頭を引きちぎってやるかもしれない！ひとまずお別れだ。俺の狩りは終わった」
languages.original_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."

traits.locale_text: 「俺に挑戦するほど強くなったら、喜んで刃を交えてやろう、{name}。もしかしたら、お前のおしゃべりな頭を引きちぎってやるかもしれない！ひとまずお別れだ。俺の狩りは終わった」

languages.text: "Falls Ihr je stark genug werdet, mich herauszufordern, kreuze ich gerne die Klinge mit Euch, {name}. Vielleicht reiße ich Euch sogar Euren geschwätzigen Kopf ab! Vorerst aber auf Wiedersehen, meine Jagd ist beendet."
languages.original_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr je stark genug werdet, mich herauszufordern, kreuze ich gerne die Klinge mit Euch, {name}. Vielleicht reiße ich Euch sogar Euren geschwätzigen Kopf ab! Vorerst aber auf Wiedersehen, meine Jagd ist beendet."

languages.text: "Bir gün bana meydan okuyacak kadar güçlenirsen seninle memnuniyetle dövüşürüm {name}. Belki o patavatsız ağzınla birlikte kafanı da koparıveririm! Şimdilik elveda. Benim avım sona erdi."
languages.original_text: "If you ever grow strong enough to challenge me, I will gladly cross blades with you, {name}. Perhaps I'll even tear your big-mouthed head off! Farewell for now, for my hunt is over."
